title: What is the biggest boy band in the world? - Quora

response.answer_text: Is that even a question; obviously bts, the impact bts has on today’s time is incredible; it’s not just about kpop but bts is dominating the world biggest celeb such as Drake , Selena, Beyoncé and so on both by fans involvement and craze( the best example would be people choice award who did them dirty by using their popularity but then ending up cheating at end) here is the whole point instead of armies being angry and sad, they charted bts whole discography and made it the top of iTunes Charts with map of soul persona at #1 , queen mono at #2 the list goes on. from album to bts merch to bt21 product and bts concerts army never fail to impress people through their dedication and love for bts and same goes to bts. There has been many world biggest band in their respective time frame but bts has set a new record; nothing could beat them they will always stay a legend💜💜

The biggest boybands have been The Beatles and One Direction… But obviously as if we see today ‘BTS’ is considered as one of the biggest boybands and that they have become so popular not only in Korea but also worldwide. Recently they were nominated in the MTV music awards for the very first time in 4 categories and they won all them. Also their new comeback single Dynamite broke the records. Now its very obvious that some people unstan and hate BTS but you can't deny the fact they are getting extremely popular. Also some people say that are just men who put makeup and are talentless.. But there many kpop groups other than BTS.. Which are also very good.. But there must have been something different or unique which had made their way worldwide.. I am Army but also i respect every boyband.
